name: Corner sweetie
description:
Corner sweetie is a casual tover defense. There are candies in each corner of your screen which shouldn't be taken by the cute ShAWWn.

To protect candies from him (or him from candies) you have multiple tools such as jelly wall, jam pound, scarecrow, decoy cake and trap. Each tool costs charges that you collect over time.

Each tool have a special motion to activate it:

1. Jam pound slows down ShAWWn. Costs 1 charge
2. Jelly wall bounces ShAWWn back. Costs 2 charges
3. Scarecrow  makes ShAWWn run from it. Costs 2 charges
4. Decoy cake  immediantly attracts ShAWWn to it. Costs 3 charges
5. Trap holds ShAWWn for a while. Costs 4 charges
